title: 大神帮看一下，自定义的村民，为什么换不出来啊
author: zzx8696321
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zzx8696321 于 2018-6-1 15:50 编辑 

/summon Villager ~ ~ ~ {CustomName:"装备出售商

人",CustomNameVisible:1b,OnGround:1b,NoGravity:1b,Silent:1b,Invulnerable:1b,Profession:5,NoAI:1

b,Career:1,CareerLevel:1,Offers:{Recipes:[{buy:

{id:"minecraft:apple",Damage:0s,Count:1b},rewardExp:0b,maxUses:9999999,sell:

{id:"minecraft:elytra",Damage:0s,Count:1b,tag:{ench:[{id:0s,lvl:4s},{id:7s,lvl:2s},

{id:70s,lvl:1s}]}}},{buy:{id:"minecraft:elytra",Damage:0s,Count:1b,tag:{ench:

[{id:0s,lvl:4s},{id:7s,lvl:2s},{id:70s,lvl:1s}]}},buyB:{id:"minecraft:apple",Damage:0s,Count:1b},rewardExp:0b,maxUses:9999999,sell:

{id:"minecraft:elytra",Damage:0s,Count:1b,tag:{Unbreakable:1b,ench:[{id:0s,lvl:4s},

{id:7s,lvl:3s}]}}}]}}


第一层，一个苹果换一个附魔的翅膀，

第二层，再用附魔翅膀+苹果换另一个翅膀，但是第二层有的时候换不出来，

看到可以交易，却拿不到手里。。求大神看一下啊，字符后缀什么的，我也补上了啊
